title: Can you get banned for 'toxicity' against the enemy team?
body: Not saying like "go get cancer" or "kys" but like just trying to tilt them, is that bannable orrr?

replies.body: Well that sucks. Id like to think I can ask a cocky pantheon in the early game "thought you were carrying?" when we stomp him later

Trash talk is ok so long as you don't cross the line into harassment. Tell him 'thought you were carrying?' once and you'd be fine. Tell him that every 20 seconds for the next 10 minutes and you wouldn't be.

Defining that line is all about reading the situation, or just staying well away from the grey area. Direct insults ('you play worse than your mum', 'haha you fucking suck', '[insert racist/sexist/homophobic term]') aren't trash talk. Spamming isn't trash talk. Etc.
